import React, { Component, useEffect } from "react"; import Header from "../component/header"; import Navbar from "../component/navbar"; import Login from "../component/login"; import Deliver from "../component/deliver"; import axios from "axios"; import Componentdidmount from "../component/componentdidmount"; function index() { useEffect(() => { try { const loggedInUser = localStorage.getItem("token"); if (loggedInUser) { const options = { headers: { Accept: "application/json, text/plain, */*", "content-type": "application/json", }, }; const apiUrl = "http://localhost:8000/api/auth/login"; axios .post( apiUrl, { email: this.state.Email, password: this.state.Password }, options ) .then((result) => { if (result.request.status == "200") { localStorage.setItem('token', result.data.data.token); console.log(result.data.data.token); $(".colMain").hide(); $(".colLogin").hide(); $(".colDeliver").show(); } else { } }) .catch((err) => { this.messageError(); console.log(err.response.status); }); } } catch (e) { console.log(e) } }, []); return ( <>

deliver.

On time,

every time.
